relevant_findings.facial_asymmetry: Right side of the face dry compared to left; right lower eyelid slightly elevated
relevant_findings.pupils: Right pupil 2.5 mm, left pupil 3 mm (constricting to 2 mm to light)
relevant_findings.palate: Elevated slightly more on left side than right
relevant_findings.tongue: Deviated to the right of midline, weakness when pushing to the right, right side of tongue swollen with decreased furrows
relevant_findings.lab_tests: Complete blood count and results of renal- and liver-function tests normal, as well as plasma levels of electrolytes, glucose, calcium, magnesium, and phosphorus
relevant_findings.ekg: Normal sinus rhythm at 66 bpm, incomplete right-bundle-branch block

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The headache had resolved, but the neck pain and hoarseness were unchanged.
